DOC.brief_summary: Elevated circulating level certain amino acid ( build block protein ) strongly associate insulin resistance . This study investigate metabolism amino acids individual normal glucose metabolism compare overweight obese pre-diabetic individual . The purpose study determine elevate level branched-chain amino acid may contribute development insulin resistance ultimately diabetes . An additional purpose determine whether exercise gastric bypass ( GBP ) surgery intervention correct aberration branched-chain amino acid metabolism insulin sensitivity improve . This information use understanding development insulin resistance type 2 diabetes at-risk population potentially improve clinical treatment condition .
DOC.brief_title: Regulation Branched-chain Amino Acid Metabolism Pre-Diabetes

Niacin contain drug History diabetes , heart disease take medication condition History hypertension ( high blood pressure ) control medication Pregnant intend become pregnant Unwillingness participate study visit , submit skeletal muscle biopsy study test continuously participate exercise training intervention program six month overweight PD group Orthopedic limitation , musculoskeletal disease and/or injury Allergic xylocaine Inability give blood continuously intravenous catheter Unwillingness exercise least three time per week Duke Center Living staff supervise time ( PD ) Exercise compliance le 85 % 6 week period ( miss > 3 exercise session 6 week period )
